analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nakusalo naajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na ajjhattaḥ dhammaḥ ajjhattassa kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā soḷasa, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā soḷasa upanissaye aṭṭhārasa purejāte

original: Nakusalo nabahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
analyzed: na kusalaḥ na bahiddhā dhammaḥ bahiddhā kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa, adhipatiyā cha, upanissaye aṭṭhārasa, purejāte
analyzed: saṅkhitta ārammaṇe aṭṭhārasa adhipatiyā cha upanissaye aṭṭhārasa purejāte

original: Nakusalaṁ naajjhattārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato ajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na ajjhatta ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ ajjhatta ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nakusalaṁ nabahiddhārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato bahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na kusalam na bahiddhā ārammaṇam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ bahiddhā ārammaṇaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
